means: 呼出，发散出( exhale的现在分词 )
吐出（肺中的空气、烟等），呼气

sentence.Network_en: Take a deep breath inhaling slowly and exhaling slowly.
sentence.Network_cn: 深呼吸,慢慢吸进,慢慢呼出.

sentence.Network_en: Unclasp your hands and return to the original position while exhaling.
sentence.Network_cn: 呼气并松开双手恢复到原位.

sentence.Network_en: Hold the breath for a moment before exhaling slowly and completely.
sentence.Network_cn: 此时在慢慢地深深地呼气之前,摒住呼吸一小会儿.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Keep your eyes closed while slowly inhaling and exhaling for 2 to 3 minutes ., 将眼睛闭上同时做 2 至 3分钟吸气呼气的动作.
exhaled 呼气, exhaling 吐息, exhaling 发散

list.abs: metalliferous 含金属的metalliferous exhalation 含金属喷气metallization 成矿酌
石油词汇英语翻译(M)--石油百科 ... magmatic eruption 岩浆喷溢 magmatic exhalation 岩浆喷发 magmatic explosion 岩浆爆发.
exhalation 喷气exhalation deposit 喷气矿床exhalative sedimentary deposit 喷气沉积矿床
exfetation 子宫外孕exhalent canal 出水沟exhaust gases 废气

entry.def: When you exhale, you breathe out the air that is in your lungs.

example.ex: Hold your breath for a moment and exhale...
example.tran: 屏住呼吸片刻，然后呼气。

example.ex: Wade exhaled a cloud of smoke and coughed.
example.tran: 韦德吐出一口烟，然后咳嗽起来。

auth_sentence.content: If only diagnosing lung cancer were as easy as exhaling.
auth_sentence.res_content: If only diagnosing lung cancer were as easy as exhaling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If only diagnosing lung cancer were as easy as exhaling.

auth_sentence.content: She rubs her palms across her skinny thighs, exhaling.
auth_sentence.res_content: She rubs her palms across her skinny thighs, exhaling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She rubs her palms across her skinny thighs, exhaling.

auth_sentence.content: She...took several deep breaths, inhaling and exhaling for a few seconds.
auth_sentence.res_content: She...took several deep breaths, inhaling and exhaling for a few seconds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She...took several deep breaths, inhaling and exhaling for a few seconds.
